mapper.select: select (select count(*) from production_request where production_start_date is null) as order_request, (select count(*) from material_request where approved is null or approved = 0) as metrial_request, (select count(*) from production_request where production_start_date is not null and end_date is null and completed_qty = 0) as metrial_request_clear, (select count(*) from production_request where production_start_date is not null and end_date is null and completed_qty > 0) as production, (select count(*) from production_request where end_date = sysdate) as today_delivered from dual
